20 #include <ros/ros.h>
21 #include <pcl/point_cloud.h>
22 #include <pcl_conversions/pcl_conversions.h>
23 #include <sensor_msgs/PointCloud2.h>
24 #include <pcl/filters/voxel_grid.h>
25 
26 class cloudHandler
27 {
28 public:
29  cloudHandler()
30  {
31  pcl_sub = nh.subscribe("pcl_filtered_miro", 10, &cloudHandler::cloudCB, this);
32  pcl_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("pcl_downsampled", 1);
33  }
34 
35  void cloudCB(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 &input)
36  {
37  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> cloud;
38  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> cloud_downsampled;
39  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 output;
40 
41  pcl::fromROSMsg(input, cloud);
42 
43  pcl::VoxelGrid<pcl::PointXYZRGB> voxelSampler;
44  voxelSampler.setInputCloud(cloud.makeShared());
45  voxelSampler.setLeafSize(0.01f, 0.01f, 0.01f);
46  voxelSampler.filter(cloud_downsampled);
47 
48  pcl::toROSMsg(cloud_downsampled, output);
49  pcl_pub.publish(output);
50 
51  }
52 protected:
53  ros::NodeHandle nh;
54  ros::Subscriber pcl_sub;
55  ros::Publisher pcl_pub;
56 };
57 
58 main(int argc, char **argv)
59 {
60  ros::init(argc, argv, "pcl_downsampling");
61 
62  cloudHandler handler;
63 
64  ros::spin();
65 
66  return 0;
67 }
